page.title: 05UNIFORM AND RULES
page.content: OUR SCHOOL UNIFORM CONSISTS OF A BLUE JUMPER OR CARDIGAN,GREY SKIRT OR TROUSERS AND WHITE OR BLUE BLOUSE OR SHIRT.WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO WEAR TRAINERS,WE MUST WEAR SUITABLE STURDY SHOES.WE HAVE TO NAME ALL OUR CLOTHES, IN CASE THEY GET LOST. WE HAVE QUITE A FEW SCHOOL RULES.HERE ARE A FEW OF THEM; YOU MUST ALWAYS BRING IN A NOTE AFTER YOU HAVE BEEN AWAY FOR ANY REASON. IT MUST BE SIGNED BY A PARENT OR GUARDIAN. ALSO YOU MUST WEAR THE SCHOOL UNIFORM.IF YOU WEAR ANYTHING DIFFERENT YOU WILL GET A DETENTION. YOU MUST NOT BE LATE FOR SCHOOL IN THE MORNING.YOU HAVE TO DO EXACTLY AS THE TEACHER SAYS BECAUSE IF YOU DON'T YOU COULD GET SUSPENDED OR EVEN EXPELLED.IF YOU ARE NAUGHTY YOU WOULD BE SENT TO THE YEAR HEAD OR HEADMASTER. NEVER RUN IN THE CORRIDOR.
